Marco Algarra, J
metadata.dc:description: Patients with Rendu-Osler-Weber disease can present severe nose bleeding. The treatment of 6 patients with this condition is reported. Supraselective embolization was the treatment of choice. One patient showed no improvement with embolization and suffered massive nosebleed requiring blood transfusion. After a review of the literature, the nasal cavity was irradiated.s.
metadata.dc:title: Enfermedad de Rendu-Osler. Seguimiento de seis casos tratados mediante embolización. Telecobaltoterapia nasal en un caso refractario.
[Rendu-Osler disease. Follow-up of 6 patients treated by embolization. Nasal telecobaltotherapy in a refractory case].
